achievements.name: Agentic AI Hackathon
details: Secured the top position in the Agentic AI Hackathon by leveraging the Coinbase Developer Platform.
Developed an AI chatbot specializing in cryptocurrencies, Web3, and blockchain.
Integrated real-time crypto price updates and market-moving news alerts.

summary: **Software Engineer** with experience in **backend development**, **data processing**, and **machine learning**. Proficient in **Python**, **Flask**, and **FastAPI**, with exposure to cloud platforms like **AWS** and **GCP**. Comfortable working with data using **Pandas**, **SQL**, and **NumPy**, and familiar with building and deploying ML models using **TensorFlow**. Interested in applying practical **software** and **data solutions** to solve real-world problems.

projects.name: Automobile Parts Manufacturing Monitoring System
details: Developed a backend system using Node.js integrated with React (VITE) for a real-time monitoring system in an automobile parts manufacturing facility.
Designed and implemented RESTful APIs for data collection, processing, and visualization.
Optimized system performance using WebSockets for real-time data updates.
Deployed the system on AWS with CI/CD pipelines for automated testing and deployment.

projects.name: Swine Fat Measurement with Computer Vision
details: Developed an automated system for measuring pig carcass fat thickness using YOLOv8 and Computer Vision.
Achieved high accuracy with a Mean Absolute Error (MAE) of ±0.43 cm.
Designed a real-time processing system with a processing rate of 19 FPS.
Built user-friendly web applications for batch, video, and real-time input using FastAPI and Next.js.
Collaborated with Betagro to enhance the efficiency of pig processing operations.

projects.name: Enhancing Food Distribution Efficiency with Ant Colony Optimization
details: Designed an optimized delivery system for Pizza Hub’s cloud kitchens using Ant Colony Optimization (ACO).
Processed food delivery datasets from Kaggle to calculate optimal routes considering customer demand and delivery distances.
Built a graph representation of the network, leveraging Python libraries such as NetworkX, Pandas, and Numpy.
Modeled pheromone-based routing strategies with ACO, iterating parameters for best efficiency.
Automated data processing with Python and visualized results using Matplotlib.
Developed a visual AI agent automation platform, similar to n8n or Make.com, enabling users to design and orchestrate AI-powered workflows through a drag-and-drop interface
Created and deployed reusable integrations with external APIs, internal systems, and LLMs (e.g., Gemini, OpenAI, Claude) for use across customer-specific use cases.
Delivered end-to-end AI automation solutions tailored to enterprise needs, including document processing, chatbot agents, crypto alert bots, and data extract-transform-load (ETL) flows.
Built AI automation workflows for diverse use cases, such as customer service, internal tooling, and real-time alerts, tailored to client requirements.
Transformed business requirements into functional implementations using Visual Basic .NET and SQL
Modified database structures to align with evolving business needs, ensuring efficient data migration and relational integrity
Developed stored procedures for data retrieval and manipulation
Migrated legacy data into modern systems while maintaining data integrity

Capstone Project: Swine Fat Measurement with Computer Vision-Developed an automated swine fat thickness measurement system using YOLOv8, Computer Vision, and FastAPI, achieving significant accuracy improvements over manual methods.

certificates.title: Google Cloud Skill Boost
certificates.description: Earned multiple badges through Google Cloud Skill Boost, demonstrating proficiency in infrastructure building with Terraform and language processing with ML. Highlights include expertise in AI and machine learning, generative AI with Vertex AI, and baseline infrastructure (GCP) setup.

certificates.title: Google Data Analytics
certificates.description: Expertise in data preparation, processing, and visualization using spreadsheets, SQL, Tableau, and R.

certificates.title: ETHGlobal Bangkok Hackathon
certificates.description: Participated in ETHGlobal Bangkok Hackathon competition, building 'HaveFun(d)'—a fundraising platform with Web3 and Web2 integration, utilizing Hedera as the destination chain.

certificates.title: EthPadThai BootCamp
certificates.description: Bootcamp for individuals interested in Web3, covering basic blockchain knowledge and programming smart contracts.
